comment.text: This translation key is used to display the action label "HotkeysActions" as a heading in a UI component. The text will be displayed above an actions block, guiding users on what they can expect to see when taking action on selected items.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Seçilmiş elementlər üzrə addımın atılması" is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be needed to convey the meaning of 'Taking action on selected items'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Seçilmiş elementlərlə əməliyyat aparılması" or "Seçilmiş elementlərdən fəaliyyət göstərilməsi".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'üzrə' can be a bit clunky in this context. Using 'lə' is more common and flows better.

The German translation "Durchführung von Handlungen zu ausgewählten Elementen" is not a natural or accurate translation of "Taking action on selected items." It sounds somewhat awkward and overly literal. The phrase "zu ausgewählten Elementen" implies an action *towards* the items, rather than *on* them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "Aktionen für ausgewählte Elemente" or "Bearbeitung ausgewählter Elemente" or "Operationen für ausgewählte Elemente".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Toimintojen suoritus valituille kohteille' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. It sounds clunky and technical. A more natural Finnish phrasing would be preferred.
While not strictly wrong, 'toimintojen suoritus' is a bit formal for a UI element. A more conversational alternative would be better.

The translation 'Prise de mesures sur les éléments sélectionnés' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Taking action on selected items'. 'Prise de mesures' implies a more formal or potentially reactive action. A more accurate and natural translation would be 'Actions sur les éléments sélectionnés' or 'Effectuer des actions sur les éléments sélectionnés'.

The translation "Ընտրված միավորների նկատմամբ միջոցներ ձեռք առնել" is a rather literal and slightly awkward translation of 'Taking action on selected items'. It doesn't flow naturally in Armenian.  ' միջոցներ ձեռք առնել' implies actively *taking* measures, while 'taking action' can be more passive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like:  "Ընտրված բաների հետ գործել" (Working with selected items), "Ընտրված բաների համար գործողություն իրականացնել" (Performing actions for selected items), or simply "Ընտրված բաները կառավարել" (Managing selected items).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ປະຕິບັດລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' while literal, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Taking action on selected items.' It emphasizes execution of items rather than the action itself. A more accurate translation might convey the action *being taken* on selected items.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ປະຕິບັດການຕໍ່ກັບລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' (Performing actions on selected items) or 'ການກະກອນລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' (Activating/Initiating selected items)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Notiek darbību veikšana ar atlasītajiem vienumiem" is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of "Taking action on selected items." It sounds awkward and verbose in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Veikt darbības ar atlasītajiem vienumiem" or "Darbības ar atlasītajiem vienumiem".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'A atuar sobre os itens selecionados' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Taking action on selected items.' 'Atuar' implies acting as an actor or performing a role, not taking action on something. A more accurate translation would focus on the 'action' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Realizar ações nos itens selecionados', 'Executar ações nos itens selecionados', or 'Agir sobre os itens selecionados'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "තේරූ අථක සඳහා ක්‍රියාමාර්ගයක් ගැනීම" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "Taking action on selected items". "අථක" is not a standard term. The translation leans too literally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "තේරීම් මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම" or "තෝරාගත් අයිතීත මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම" (more formal).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure is a bit clunky in Sinhala. It can be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrasing to "තේරීම් මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම" or "තෝරාගත් අයිතීත මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම" will improve flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ukrepanje za izbrane predmete' is too literal and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Taking action on selected items' in a user interface context. It sounds somewhat awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Dejanja nad izbranimi predmeti' or 'Obdelava izbranih predmetov'.  The best option depends on the overall tone of the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Предузимање радње на одабране предмете" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Taking action on selected items'. It sounds somewhat formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "Извођење радње на изабраним елементима" or "Обрада изабраних елемената".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Preduzimanje radnje na odabrane predmete' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Taking action on selected items'. 'Preduzimanje radnje' is more akin to 'undertaking an action' rather than 'taking action'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Radnje na odabranim stavkama / Akcija na odabranim stavkama / Izvršavanje akcije na odabranim stavkama

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seçilen öğeler üzerinde işlem yapılıyor' is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Turkish. It translates to 'An action is being performed on selected items'. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning in a more idiomatic way.

The translation "对选定的项目采取操作" is a literal translation but lacks natural flow and clarity in Chinese. 'Taking action' is not always directly translated as '采取操作'. It's too formal and robotic for a hotkey panel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑更自然的表达，例如：'执行选定操作' 或 '处理选定项目' (Xingcheng xuandingsuo caozuoyu o' or 'Chulifxuangding xiangmu')
